options.optionText: I saw everything... and I mean *everything*.
options.responseText: Good for you, voyeur boy. Did you take notes?

followUpOptions.optionText: You didn’t even notice me watching?
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, I noticed. But you’re not exactly a threat, are you?

followUpOptions.optionText: You do realize your pants are still off, right?
followUpOptions.responseText: And? What, you wanna frame this moment? Go ahead, take a picture.

followUpOptions.optionText: I'm just saying... It’s pretty bold.
followUpOptions.responseText: Bold is boring. I prefer 'reckless.' Keeps things interesting. Maybe you should try it sometime instead of being Vault-Tec’s little rule-following pet.

followUpOptions.optionText: Aren't you worried about leaving... evidence?
followUpOptions.responseText: What? A few stains on a tablecloth? Trust me, this place has seen worse. Purity Police will just scrub it down.

followUpOptions.optionText: So, uh... how was it? Worth the risk?
followUpOptions.responseText: What do you think, genius? Look at me. Look at them. That’s the faces of guys who just saw God. And me? I’m just getting started.

options.responseText: Run along, hero. Don’t trip over your stiff little problem on the way out.
